cons: twelve hour shifts are a bit rubbish

pros: The salaries are slightly higher than you would find elsewhere
cons: HO fosters a toxic culture of bullying where their senior managers are protected at the expense of the staff members they abuse. If you don't fall in line, expect to be bullied and gaslit until you either leave of your own accord or are forced to sign an NDA and paid to leave quietly. Many staff have left under these circumstances, several perpetrators remain in post. Do not work here if you value your mental health.
